tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: GoPro: Kirby Chambliss & Red Bull Air Force - EAA AirVenture Oshkosh 2012
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Shot 100% on the new HD HERO2® camera from ‪GoPro.com. Kirby Chambliss and the Red Bull Air Force light up the sky at the 2012 EAA AirVenture in Oshkosh, WI. http Music At Dawn We Rage "Winner" Buy at: atdawnwerage.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: is﻿ nobody going to comment on the fact that "red bull gives you wings"

I need﻿ your opinion, pls. I want to buy one But i am lost between a GoPro hero 2 and Rollei bullet 4s. the go pro must be better but expensive. Rollei seems cheaper by far because you get a WiFi remote control and﻿ LCD viewer.

@nxnoixr sure is right. i couldnt believe it when my friend told me about this site. Listen to this, i really﻿ ddnt expect that this site would send me a cheque of $240 for doing some surveys. i found it here >-> bit.ly/S2rRyl?=btnqbg
Check out my channel for a brand new GoPro Hero2﻿ Fishing EDit. Thanks for those who checked it out
Be﻿ a hero.
or maybe youtubes really dumb ad placement was blocking the like button. so they just clicked what they could. I'm going to vimeo. ﻿
Why is it that whenever a commercial actually decides to advertise dubstep, they don't pick good or professional tracks? That always annoys﻿ me..
super chingonsisimo﻿ de todo este video.
This is insane omg!﻿
you﻿ forgot Dubstep
Just﻿ one word, amazing.
who came here from Flightradar24 thumbs up ﻿
red bull + GoPro + Dubstep= super awesome﻿ video :D
This man is my idol. Congrats on your long and prosperous career mt chambliss. i hope to be﻿ just like you someday
We need a video with﻿ real sound not music favored by someone
oshkoshbagosh﻿
It looked like﻿ he used the suction cup mount on the wing and the elevator.
oh god! why is everyone using dubstep now? D: it's awfull!﻿
I'm gettin' sick even by﻿ watching!
that plane is burning alot of﻿ oil

GoPro Community Manager here. I was at Oshkosh with our media team this year grabbing stuff for our social networks, so I interacted﻿ with Kirby and his plane quite a bit. All that is used on his plane in this, and every edit we've done with Kirby, are the standard GoPro 3M flat adhesives. We wouldn't mount them to his plane if we weren't 110% sure they would stay on.. considering the potential safety implications if one was to fall off.
i guess﻿ they got tierd of the PS3
Nope. Our media team would never apply a suction cup to a plane that pulls that many G's. As I stated in another comment, all of the mounts were the standard 3M flat adhesive. ﻿
Flying rocks! GoPro and aerobatics﻿ put together is AWESOME!!!
why does everyone consider all electronic music dubstep now,﻿ its awful!!

Reviewer.Music: Drum and Bass, Dubstep, Jungle, Liquid Drum and Bass, and Neurofunk
